values: 搜寻；查找；搜索；搜查；探求；仔细检查；搜…的身；思索；细想（问题答案等）；细察；细查
搜寻；搜索；查找；调查；侦查；审查；检查；（计算机）检索；网络搜索

synonym.mean: 搜索；搜寻；调查；搜查；探求

word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重努力和彻底搜寻某人或某地。
指像梳头一样进行搜寻，侧重费力和彻底搜查。
书面用词，使用广。指付出很大努力去寻找某人或某物。

word_group.brief_definition: 寻找工作；求职；职位搜索
(强调不知道答案)我怎么知道
搜索方法；搜索法；搜寻方法
互联网搜索；因特网搜索；网络搜索
关键字搜索；关键词搜索
二分搜索法；<计>折半查找；折半搜寻

bilingual.source: A search engine helps you find things.
bilingual.target: 搜索引擎帮助你找到东西。

bilingual.source: You can go online to search for information.

bilingual.target: 搜索关于不同植物的信息。
搜索关于不同动物的信息。

bilingual.source: Search online or in the library for information.
bilingual.target: 在线或在图书馆搜索信息。
为青少年设计的智能搜索引擎。

bilingual.source: Search online to find out more about team sports.
bilingual.target: 上网搜索以了解更多关于团队运动的信息。

bilingual.source: You can search “found items” or post your “lost items”.
bilingual.target: 你可以搜索“找到的物品”或发布你的“丢失物品”。

list.abstract: search，英文单词，作名词或动词，翻译为搜查、调查等。
《Search》是一部由张东润、郑秀晶主演的电视剧，于2020年10月17日播出。 该剧讲述被称为「死亡之地」的阴森非武装地带，出现了未确认的生命体，搜索队展开了追击这些生命体的惊险追击，将脱离浪漫爱情剧的路线，展现令人感动的战友情。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, did you search the crash vault?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们搜索地下室了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Because now and forevermore, when you Google yourself, your search results will read: Harvard, 2013.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为从今以后，当你用谷歌搜索自己的时候，搜索结果中会提到“哈佛大学 2013”。

yingyinNormal.en: They don't manipulate search results, but let's just say a big spread in Vanity Fair...
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们没有篡改搜索结果，但是如果在《名利场》上大做广告...

yingyinNormal.en: Imagine a duel. Me and Conway. Now, Conway has a powerful gun, a search engine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 想象一个决斗在我和康威之间展开，康威有一把厉害的枪，一个搜索引擎。

yingyinNormal.en: But as a result of the destruction of Vulcan, your Starfleet began to aggressively search distant quadrants of space.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但在摧毁瓦肯星之后，你们的星际舰队开始大力搜索太空中遥远的象限。

yingyinNormal.en: This is obviously not the outcome we wanted. But we will resume the search the moment it is safe to walk through the forest again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 显然这不是我们想要的结果。当能安全进入森林时我们会继续搜索的。

yingyinNormal.en: Starting at 1:00 p.m., we'll be assigning every volunteer to a search team. Each team is in charge of a single section of the critical 12-square-mile radius.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从下午一点开始，我们把志愿者分成若干小组。每个小组负责一块区域在方圆十二平方英里内展开搜索。

yingyinNormal.en: All calls, e-mails, messages in and out of the White House will be monitored and archived. Every phone call will be recorded as we search for the leak. Video surveillance?
yingyinNormal.zh: 所有电话，电邮和短信进出白宫的一切通讯都会被监控归档。搜索泄露源期间每通电话都会被录音。视频监控呢？

yingyinNormal.en: We covered about half the search zone already. And, tomorrow is a full day. And the more people came, the, the faster it went. Could I... So, if you have some time tomorrow, we would love the help.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们大约已经搜索了一半区域。明天还有一整天的搜救工作。来的人越多 工作开展得越快。我能... 如果你明天有时间的话，我们会很感谢你的帮助。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, if it's not cholera then based on a quick internet search the other explanations in decreasing order of likelihood are Hirschsprung's Disease, botulism, a 30-foot tapeworm or accidental ingestion of chrysanthemum blossoms.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，如果那不是霍乱，根据搜索结果由相似度递减排列的其他解释，分别是先天性巨结肠，肉毒杆菌中毒，一条30英尺长的绦虫，或者是不小心摄入菊花。

yingyinNormal.en: I need to search from a higher ground.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我应该去更高的地方找。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't worry, we're just gonna search here for an hour, them we're gonna go over to Joey's and search, OK?
yingyinNormal.zh: 放心，我们找1个小时，就会到乔伊那边找，好吗？

yingyinNormal.en: New arrivals came by the boatload in search of a new life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大量新移民乘坐船只来到这里，寻找他们的新生活。

yingyinNormal.en: And all the while, we search for signs, of our true enemies return.
yingyinNormal.zh: 同时寻找我们真正敌人，回归的迹象。

yingyinNormal.en: It's just very hard to understand you with all the apparatus. Search him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 戴着那东西，我很难听懂你说话...给我搜。我...

yingyinNormal.en: No, thanks. I'm really busy with my like-sign dilepton supersymmetry search.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不了，谢谢我在研究象征轻子超对称性，真的很忙。

yingyinNormal.en: Now that one is back, I have a pretty good idea where to find the other. Search him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个回来了，另一个也不难找，给我搜搜一下。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. You know, and given my lifelong search for irony you can imagine how happy I am!
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，而且你知道我一辈子都在找寻讽刺的事，你可以想像的到我有多开心！

yingyinNormal.en: How many of our guards were slain? Can we afford not to search out such a potent adversary?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们有多少侍卫被杀死了？不去搜寻这个强大的敌人，后果我们承受的起吗？

yingyinNormal.en: His search for consciousness consumed him totally. Barely spoke to anyone, except the hosts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他对意识的探究耗尽了他的生命力，除了接待员，他几乎不和任何人说话。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 搜寻; 搜查; 寻找

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 彻查的；仔细探究的

word_family.mean: v. 查找；搜寻；搜查；搜…的身；在（计算机网络或数据库）中搜索

sense_info_list.en: go through or look around carefully and thoroughly in an effort to find something
sense_info_list.zh: 搜寻; 搜查; 寻找

examination_example.sentence: Citizens still have a right to expect private documents to remain private and protected by the Constitution's prohibition on unreasonable <highlight>searches</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公民依然有权要求私人文件保持私密性，并受到宪法禁止无理搜查的保护。

examination_example.sentence: In many cases, it would not be overly burdensome for authorities to obtain a warrant to <highlight>search</highlight> through phone contents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很多情况下，当局获得搜查手机内容的搜查令并不太麻烦。

examination_example.sentence: Since the days of Aristotle, a <highlight>search</highlight> for universal principles has characterized the scientific enterprise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自亚里士多德时代以来，科学事业的特点一直是寻求普遍法则。

sense_info_list.en: look for information on a computer, the internet, or others

examination_example.sentence: By watching what people <highlight>search</highlight> for, click on and say online, companies can aim "behavioural" ads at those most likely to buy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过观察人们在网上搜索、点击和表达的内容，企业可以将“行为”广告投放给最有可能购买产品的网民。

sense_info_list.en: try to find the answer to a problem

word_usage.usage:
search作名词时，其后常搭配介词of或者for，of后面侧重“寻找的对象”，如：a thorough search of the building 对大楼的彻底搜查；
for后面侧重“寻找的目的”，如：the search for a cure 寻找治疗方法
search作动词时，既可作及物动词又可作不及物动词。作及物动词时，其后可直接接名词或代词，如：search the Web；作不及物动词时，其后常搭配介词for/in/through，如：search for something to say

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: go through or look around carefully and thoroughly in an effort to find something

examination_example.sentence: Stretch out the process in <highlight>search</highlight> of the optimal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 延长过程以寻找最佳方案。

sense_info_list.en: look for information on a computer, the internet, or others

examination_example.sentence: There is a direct connection from Marconi to today's social media, <highlight>search</highlight> engines, and program streaming.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Marconi与当今的社交媒体、搜索引擎和节目流媒体播放有着直接的联系。

sense_info_list.en: carefully look for someone or something

examination_example.sentence: Rehearsals involve communication, evacuation, <highlight>search</highlight> and rescue, and other scenarios.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 演习包括沟通、疏散、搜索和救援等情况。

sense_info_list.en: try to find the answer to a problem

examination_example.sentence: But while there is money available to be spent on it, the <highlight>search</highlight> to understand the secrets of ageing will be ongoing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，尽管有资金可用于此，但了解衰老秘密的探索仍将继续。

word_usage.usage:
in search of作固定短语时，意思是“寻找”，其中的of不能换为for。
示例：他们立刻起程去寻找这个失踪的女孩。
误 They started off at once in search for the missing girl.
正 They started off at once in search of the missing girl.

search作动词指“寻找”，search+寻找的范围，而search for+寻找的目标，search out则指“找到”。
(1) We are searching the house.
我们正在搜查这房子。
(2) We are searching for the house.
我们将找寻这房子。
(3) We will search out the house.
我们将会找到这房子。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: go through or look around carefully and thoroughly in an effort to find something

examination_example.sentence: In the early times, pigs were allowed to wander freely in <highlight>search</highlight> of food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在早期，猪被允许自由走动寻找食物。

examination_example.sentence: Many got killed in the wild when <highlight>searching</highlight> for food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多(野猪)在野外寻找食物时被杀死。

examination_example.sentence: After an unsuccessful <highlight>search</highlight>, the restaurant's owner called the Daily News for help.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一次不成功的搜索后，餐馆的老板打电话给《每日新闻》寻求帮助。

sense_info_list.en: try to find the answer to a problem

examination_example.sentence: I felt in not sharing the ordinary things that were happening in my life, and the wild mental <highlight>search</highlight> for something more interesting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我觉得不能分享我生活中发生的普通事情，以及对更有趣的事情的疯狂的精神探索。

sense_info_list.en: carefully look for someone or something
look for information on a computer; the internet; or others

examination_example.sentence: In a study carried out by psychologists on the disruptive effects of smartphones, two groups of college students were given word <highlight>search</highlight> puzzles.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在心理学家进行的一项关于智能手机破坏性影响的研究中，两组大学生被要求做单词搜索谜题。

examination_example.sentence: To solve word <highlight>search</highlight> puzzles.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了解决单词搜索难题。

word_usage.usage:
in search of作固定短语时，意思是“寻找”，其中的of不能换为for。
示例：他们立刻起程去寻找这个失踪的女孩。
误 They started off at once in search for the missing girl.
正 They started off at once in search of the missing girl.

search作动词指“寻找”，search+寻找的范围，而search for+寻找的目标，search out则指“找到”。
(1) We are searching the house.
我们正在搜查这房子。
(2) We are searching for the house.
我们将找寻这房子。
(3) We will search out the house.
我们将会找到这房子。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 彻查的；仔细探究的

word_family.mean: v. 查找；搜寻；搜查；搜…的身；在（计算机网络或数据库）中搜索

sense_info_list.en: go through or look around carefully and thoroughly in an effort to find something

examination_example.sentence: Jeff <highlight>searched</highlight> in vain for Rosie in the next four days.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在接下来的四天里Jeff没有找到Rosie。

examination_example.sentence: I myself went through this <highlight>searching</highlight> process and found something that has changed my experience at college for the better.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我自己也经历了这个探究过程，并发现了一些东西，使我在大学的经历变得更好。

examination_example.sentence: Engineering graduates were more likely to have started their job <highlight>search</highlight> already, and to have accepted a job.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 工科毕业生更有可能已经开始找工作，并且已经接受了一份工作。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 彻查的；仔细探究的

word_family.mean: v. 查找；搜寻；搜查；搜…的身；在（计算机网络或数据库）中搜索

sense_info_list.en: go through or look around carefully and thoroughly in an effort to find something

examination_example.sentence: Officers did a quick <highlight>search</highlight> of the house but couldn't find the girl.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 警察迅速搜查了房子，但没有找到那个女孩。

examination_example.sentence: Nowadays millions of Chinese leave the countryside to <highlight>search</highlight> for work in the cities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，数百万中国人离开农村去城市找工作。

examination_example.sentence: Frank held his breath under the water to <highlight>search</highlight> for his ring in the swimming pool.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 弗兰克在水下屏住呼吸，在游泳池里寻找他的戒指。

sense_info_list.en: look for information on a computer, the internet, or others

examination_example.sentence: I can <highlight>search</highlight> useful information online.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我可以在网上搜索有用的信息。

examination_example.sentence: But before that, I can <highlight>search</highlight> online and see if I can find some advice for you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但在此之前，我可以在网上搜索一下，看能不能给你找到一些建议。

examination_example.sentence: Users can use them to surf online and <highlight>search</highlight> for maps and weather reports.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 用户可以用它们上网冲浪，搜索地图和天气预报。

word_usage.usage:
in search of作固定短语时，意思是“寻找”，其中的of不能换为for。
示例：他们立刻起程去寻找这个失踪的女孩。
误 They started off at once in search for the missing girl.
正 They started off at once in search of the missing girl.

search作动词指“寻找”，search+寻找的范围，而search for+寻找的目标，search out则指“找到”。
(1) We are searching the house.
我们正在搜查这房子。
(2) We are searching for the house.
我们将找寻这房子。
(3) We will search out the house.
我们将会找到这房子。
